title: Participate and submit to UTFG events

fields.name: Name
fields.previousResponsesDescription: Press the edit button to view or edit the previously submission data below

errors.formRechedMaxResponseCount: Maximum number of response has been reached

validation.typeInvalid: Incorrect format, please check and try again
validation.numberInvalid: Invalid numbers, please check and try again
validation.optionInvalid: Invalid option, please check and try again

errors.formRequireRegistered: Need to register for UTFG before filling out this form
errors.formRequireInternalLabel: Filling out this form requires a special identity, please confirm before filling out the form, if you have any questions, please contact the official
errors.formNotEditable: The form is no longer editable
errors.formNotDeletable: The form can no longer be deleted

filled.subject: Form {formTitle} received new response
filled.notifyContent: User {userNickname} (User ID: {userID}) filled out form {formTitle} (Form ID: {formID})

notify.emailReason: You are receiving this email because this email address is registered on the form notification mailing list, please contact the UTFG official if you have any questions.

edited.subject: Form {formTitle} response is updated
edited.notifyContent: User {userNickname} (User ID: {userID}) has updated form {formTitle} (Form ID: {formID})

filled.emailReason: You are receiving this email because the account to which this email address is bound is filling out a form in the system. If you have any questions, please contact UTFG officials.
filled.subject: Your {formTitle} form response has been received
filled.title: Form completed successfully
filled.received: We have received your form response (ID: {formResponseID}), please be patient and wait for the result, thank you for filling in the form!

edited.emailReason: You are receiving this email because the account tied to this email address is updating its form in the system. If you have any questions, please contact UTFG officials.
edited.subject: Received an update to your {formTitle} form
edited.title: Form updated successfully
edited.edited: We have received your form update (ID: {formResponseID}), please be patient and wait for the result, thank you for filling in the form!

editRequired.requireEdit: Sorry, your form data (ID: {formResponseID}) needs to be edited again, thank you for your cooperation!
editRequired.emailReason: You are receiving this email because the account that this email address is tied to has a form in the system that needs to be updated. If you have any questions, please contact UTFG officials.
editRequired.subject: Your {formTitle} form data needs editing
editRequired.title: Form data needs editing

mails.responseBelow: The form responses are as follows:
